text.text: Here is a link to Slack Help Centre - <https://slack.com/intl/en-gb/help/articles/201980108-Add-people-to-a-channel|Add people to a channel> :slack:
Here is a link to Slack Help Centre - <https://slack.com/intl/en-gb/help/articles/202528808-Search-in-Slack|Search in Slack> :fist:
Try pressing F6, or Fn + F6. If this doesn't work see <https://www.technipages.com/fix-slack-could-not-find-camera-and-microphone|this helpful page> :slack:
Here is a link to <https://www.technipages.com/fix-slack-could-not-find-camera-and-microphone|a helpful troubleshooting page> :slack:

Here is a link to Slack Help Centre - <https://slack.com/intl/en-gb/help/articles/212675257-Join-a-Slack-workspace|Join a workspace> :slack: 

 *Try these steps to add a new workspace to your existing Slack app* 

 1. Open your Slack App [mobile or desktop]
 2. Towards the top left of the screen you will see either a + [desktop] or the logo of your current workspace [mobile]. Press/click on that.
 3. You will see an option to Add Workspaces [desktop] or Add a workspace [mobile]
 4. Follow the instructions
Here is a link to <https://re-act.org.uk/tech-support|submit a support ticket> :fist:
